title: Horror Game Ambient Soundscapes Vol. 3
description: The third version of horror ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating a disturbing, creepy and dark atmosphere for your Horror, Dark Fantasy, Post-Apocalyptic Game. Contains 100 different soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/horror-game-ambient-soundscapes-vol-3

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/y90rfcvfkfqytsl/MSE%20-%20Horror%20Game%20Ambient%20Soundscapes%20Vol.%203.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 100 different ambient soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.


Immerse your audience in darkness, creepy atmosphere with dark ambient soundscapes, melodic phrases of musical instruments, mystical voices, sounds of fear and upcoming danger.


These ambient soundscapes work great as a background, they will help you tell a story, increase tension, fill the atmosphere in game scenes. They can also be used for the background in the menu. You can mix and match these soundscapes with each other to create extra variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 100 ambient sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes for dark fantasy, horror, post apocalypse and more


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 150 minutes 00 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
